course_description: This course includes further development of skills introduced in Jazz Dance I with greater emphasis on style, performance, and technique. More technically challenging movement sequences will be introduced and students will be expected to individualize movement at a beginner/intermediate level. May be taken up to three times for credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 2549, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: T. Myers, Status: Open
